item.description:
We're going to have a holiday party. Bring food to share and/or something to drink. Please post with your RSVP what you will be bringing so that we won't have too much of the same thing. Feel free to bring your favorite music too.

Since this meetup is at a private location, only members that have attended at least two meetup events with this group will be given the location of the event. The details of the location will be e-mailed out before the event.

See you all there!!

EMAIL NOELLE IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO ATTEND. SHE WILL SEND YOU LOCATION DETAILS.
item.how_to_find_us: Check your e-mail for the address. E-mail me or call if you didn't get it.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Holiday party and pot luck
